The good sheepheardes dutie by George Phillips. Paines of a faithful pastor Phillips, George, fl. 1597. Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
[35] p.
Printed for William Leake, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Churchyarde at the signe of the Greyhound, [London] : 1597.
Formerly STC 19860 -- Cf. STC (2nd ed.). First issued with title: The paines of a faithful pastor -- Cf. STC (2nd ed.). Imperfect: stained and tightly bound. Signatures: A-B⁸, C³. Reproduction of original in: British Library.
=======
